Name: Minesweeper Classy
About the game: I have always loved minesweeper puzzle games and decided to make my version of it, a stylish and smooth play experience. Features: - Play classic minesweeper: beginner, intermediate and expert. - 45 different Classy levels with unique layouts to beat. - NEW: Dark mode available! - NEW: Classic Minesweeper colored numbers available if you prefer those! - Improve your best times. - Unlock different stylish color palettes, in addition to dark/light mode and classy or classic colored numbers. - Various settings to customize the game. - Level editor: create your own levels to share, copy levels other players have made with a share code!
